net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth

Class RealmImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth.RealmImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Realm

    public class RealmImpl
extends Object
implements Realm
    This method describes an authentication realm. The URI to be authenticated may contain a scheme, server name, and path. The scheme and server name are optional.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • isAuthorizationValid

        public boolean isAuthorizationValid(AuthState state,
                                    String authorizationName,
                                    String authorizationSecret)
        Description copied from interface: Realm
        Check if the authorization information is valid for this realm. If the authorization name is not defined in this realm then false is returned. If the realm has no user secrets then this method always returns false.
        Specified by:
        isAuthorizationValid in interface Realm
        Parameters:
        state - state of request for authorization.
        authorizationName - The authorization name.
        authorizationSecret - The authorization secret.
        Returns:
        true if the authorization name is defined in this realm and the secret matches.

      • isIPValid

        public boolean isIPValid(String ipAddress)
        Description copied from interface: Realm
        Check if the IP address matches one of the IP patterns. If there are no IP patterns defined this method always returns false.
        Specified by:
        isIPValid in interface Realm
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - The IP address.
        Returns:
        true if the IP address matches one of the patterns.

      • isValidForURL

        Return true if valid for URL.
        Specified by:
        isValidForURL in interface Realm
        Parameters:
        url - the URL.
        Returns:
        true or false.
